entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Fort Erie
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain showers and flurries beginning late in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 80. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
